testcase.system-out:
=== 测试房间表操作 === 17:31:26.404 [main] DEBUG com.hotel.util.ConnectionPool - Database connection obtained 1. 查询房间类型: - 标准单人间 (¥188.00/晚) - 标准双人间 (¥268.00/晚) - 豪华套房 (¥588.00/晚) - 总统套房 (¥1288.00/晚) - 超级豪华总统套房 (¥100000.00/晚)

3. 查询所有预订: - 预订#20 马鸣 房间101 (2025-10-12 至 2025-10-13) CHECKED_OUT - 预订#19 徐安然 房间504 (2025-10-12 至 2025-10-13) CHECKED_OUT - 预订#16 YuzeTong 房间111 (2025-10-01 至 2025-10-04) CHECKED_OUT - 预订#15 YuzeTong 房间402 (2025-09-26 至 2025-09-30) CHECKED_OUT - 预订#14 YuzeTong 房间301 (2025-09-26 至 2025-09-28) CHECKED_OUT - 预订#12 YuzeTong 房间302 (2025-09-26 至 2025-09-28) CHECKED_OUT - 预订#8 王大明 房间203 (2025-09-26 至 2025-09-28) CHECKED_OUT - 预订#7 YuzeTong 房间111 (2025-09-26 至 2025-09-28) CHECKED_OUT - 预订#6 YuzeTong 房间201 (2025-09-26 至 2025-09-28) CHECKED_OUT - 预订#1 王大明 房间102 (2025-09-26 至 2025-09-28) CHECKED_OUT - 预订#2 李小芳 房间213 (2025-09-25 至 2025-09-27) CHECKED_IN - 预订#4 赵四 房间401 (2025-10-01 至 2025-10-03) CHECKED_IN

testcase.name: testUserTableOperations
testcase.system-out:
=== 测试用户表操作 === 1. 查询所有用户: 17:31:26.410 [main] DEBUG com.hotel.util.ConnectionPool - Database connection obtained 用户总数: 5 - 帅哥 (佟雨泽) - 佟雨泽 (佟雨泽) - admin (系统管理员) - staff001 (张小明) - staff002 (李小红)
2. 根据用户名查询: 17:31:26.412 [main] DEBUG com.hotel.util.ConnectionPool - Database connection obtained 找到管理员: 系统管理员
3. 测试用户认证: 17:31:26.414 [main] DEBUG com.hotel.util.ConnectionPool - Database connection obtained 用户认证成功: 系统管理员
4. 测试插入新用户: 17:31:26.416 [main] DEBUG com.hotel.util.ConnectionPool - Database connection obtained 17:31:26.422 [main] INFO com.hotel.dao.impl.UserDAOImpl - User inserted successfully with ID: 13 插入用户成功，ID: 13
5. 测试更新用户: 17:31:26.422 [main] DEBUG com.hotel.util.ConnectionPool - Database connection obtained 17:31:26.424 [main] DEBUG com.hotel.util.ConnectionPool - Database connection obtained 17:31:26.428 [main] INFO com.hotel.dao.impl.UserDAOImpl - User updated successfully with ID: 13 更新结果: 成功
6. 测试删除用户: 17:31:26.429 [main] DEBUG com.hotel.util.ConnectionPool - Database connection obtained 17:31:26.435 [main] INFO com.hotel.dao.impl.UserDAOImpl - User deleted successfully with ID: 13 删除结果: 成功
